alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 12 at 1:33AM PST until March 13 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on Highway 395.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
